/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban environment. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the cityscape.
